partnersList.name: Microsoft
partnersList.description: Microsoft is a globally renowned technology company, known for its wide range of software, hardware, and cloud services, including Windows, Office, Azure, and Surface devices.

partnersList.name: IdentityServer
partnersList.description: IdentityServer is an open-source authentication and authorization framework that helps developers secure their web applications and APIs with ease, providing a robust and customizable identity management solution.

partnersList.name: Octopus Deploy
partnersList.description: Octopus is a DevOps automation platform designed to simplify the deployment and management of applications. It streamlines the release process and ensures consistency in software delivery.

partnersList.name: Zendesk
partnersList.description: Control4 is a home automation and smart home system that enables homeowners to control and automate various aspects of their homes, such as lighting, climate, entertainment, and security, for enhanced convenience and efficiency.

partnersList.name: Control4
partnersList.description: 4Sight from Control4 allows you to be alerted of things at home while you're away, including the kids arriving home safely.
